question: Which nation was the location of "Operation Verano"?
explanation: Operation Verano occurred between 28 June and 8 August of 1958 on the Sierra Maestra Hills of Cuba. This operation was sanctioned by the then Batista Government of Cuba to remove the presence of Fidel Castro's revolutionary army from the hills. This operation followed the Battle of La Plata and Battle of Las Mercedes which resulted in the defeat of the government's military and rebel's victory.
